WorkItem.Description:
Warning about the function's array_key_exists first argument not being nor integer nor string is raised in PHPExcel/Cell/DefaultValueBinder.php on line 84.
Â 
The variable $pValue should be checked for being a string or should be casted to string type.
WorkItem.Summary: PHP Warning raised in function array_key_exists

Comments.Message: The warning is caused by the fact that none of the statements could capture values such as 1.40-E9 which should be returned as numeric. I have removed the preg_match and replaced it with is_numeric || is_float and it worked fine.
